EmailTemplate.name: Townsville Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit Exclusive Event Invite - Townsville
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From: Microsoft Office User <James_Nutbeen@intuit.com> Date: Mon, 4 May 2015 11:17:32 +1000 To: Toni Austin <Toni.Austin@bigpond.com> Subject: Intuit Exclusive Event Invite - Townsville
Dear Toni,
Join us for an Exclusive Intuit QuickBooks Online Event for accounting and bookkeeping professionals at the Rydges Southbank Townsville.
In a casual environment, this is an event to get together swap business cards with people in the same industry and learn about the new features available in QuickBooks Online including great tips on how to grow your business. We aim to provide some free resources and great contacts to help all of us in the future including an overview of KeyPay Payroll, the launch of Apps.com and a look at our app partner TSheets.
Connect, learn and share with like-minded people at our exclusive event.
Rydges Southbank Townsville – Wednesday 20th May 2015:
4.30pm – Registration 4.45pm – Introduction to Intuit and the history of QuickBooks 4.50pm – QuickBooks Online demonstration and new features 5.10pm – Overview of KeyPay (QuickBooks Payroll) 5.25pm – ProAdvisor Program and the launch of Apps.com 5.35pm – How to grow your business with the cloud 5.45pm – TSheets time tracking 6.00pm – Networking
Presenters:
John Horgan - Intuit Business Development Manager Hayden Wall - Intuit Account Manager Matthew Pisarski - Intuit Account Manager Ian Yesberg - Regional Business Services Violetta Smirnova - TSheets
Free Event | Parking Available | Food & Drinks Provided
If you would like to attend or have any colleagues that would benefit in attending please kindly advise the name and email address of all attendees or register here.
Look forward to seeing you there.
Regards, Matthew Pisarski National Account Manager +61 455 078 110
